dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Okay, wait. I'm reading this here, and it says internet has been launched "only on one train on the Astana-Almaty route." One? Just one train?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Okay, wait. I'm reading this here, and it says internet has been launched only on one train on the Astana-Almaty route. One? Just one train?
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: По словам председателя комитета, интернет запущен только на одном поезде по маршруту Астана – Алматы.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, uh, that's, that's currently the situation, A. It's, like, a very, very limited rollout, um, at the moment.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, uh, that's, that's currently the situation, A. It's, like, a very, very limited rollout, um, at the moment.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: But, like, they talked about 16 routes, right? With Talgo trains? What's, what's the deal with that?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: But, like, they talked about sixteen routes, right? With Talgo trains? What's, what's the deal with that?
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: По данным КТЖ, в Казахстане насчитывается порядка 16 маршрутов, на которых курсируют поезда Talgo.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: So, um, those 16 routes, that's where the Talgo trains operate. And those specific trains are, like, the only ones technically capable of even having internet, you know, inside them.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: So, um, those sixteen routes, that's where the Talgo trains operate. And those specific trains are, like, the only ones technically capable of even having internet, you know, inside them.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Технически сегодня только эти поезда способны раздавать интернет внутри

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Oh, okay. So, it's about the train's hardware, not just, like, the route itself.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Oh, okay. So, it's about the train's hardware, not just, like, the route itself.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Exactly. The older ones, um, like the Soviet-era trains? They just, they can't handle the system. They’re, uh, they’re too old, basically.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Exactly. The older ones, um, like the Soviet-era trains? They just, they can't handle the system. They're, uh, they're too old, basically.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: соответственно, на старых, советского образца (поездах. – Ред.), внедрить эту систему невозможно.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: So, they can't put it on those at all? Like, no upgrades?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: So, they can't put it on those at all? Like, no upgrades?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: No, uh, Seisembekov said it's impossible to implement on them. So, the focus is definitely on the Talgo fleet.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: No, uh, Seisembekov said it's impossible to implement on them. So, the focus is definitely on the Talgo fleet.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: соответственно, на старых, советского образца (поездах. – Ред.), внедрить эту систему невозможно.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Right, okay. So, the goal is to get it on all the 16 Talgo routes then? Eventually?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Right, okay. So, the goal is to get it on all the sixteen Talgo routes then? Eventually?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, that's, um, that's what they're working towards with Kazakhstan Railways. To get full-fledged internet on all those 16 routes.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, that's, um, that's what they're working towards with Kazakhstan Railways. To get full-fledged internet on all those sixteen routes.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Поэтому мы сейчас с КТЖ прорабатываем этот вопрос и намечаем планы, чтобы на всех 16 маршрутах обеспечить полноценным интернетом.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: And, uh, when is "eventually," exactly? Is there, like, a timeline for the rest of them?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: And, uh, when is eventually, exactly? Is there, like, a timeline for the rest of them?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Uh, he couldn't actually name, like, exact dates for the introduction on other routes. It's, um, it's still being negotiated.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Uh, he couldn't actually name, like, exact dates for the introduction on other routes. It's, um, it's still being negotiated.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Назвать точные сроки внедрения интернета в поездах на других маршрутах он не смог.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Wow. So, project launched early this year, and we're, like, still at one train. That's, um, that's some speed, I guess.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Wow. So, project launched early this year, and we're, like, still at one train. That's, um, that's some speed, I guess.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Он напомнил, что проект был запущен в начале этого года. ... интернет запущен только на одном поезде по маршруту Астана – Алматы.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Well, you know, they're also, um, negotiating to ensure it doesn't, like, impact ticket costs, which is, uh, pretty important.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Well, you know, they're also, um, negotiating to ensure it doesn't, like, impact ticket costs, which is, uh, pretty important.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Мы с ними ведём (переговоры. – Ред.), чтобы это не отразилось на стоимости билетов

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, for sure. But still, one train, man. It's, uh, it's pretty wild.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, for sure. But still, one train, man. It's, uh, it's pretty wild.
